entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
